title: my account is gone all my game information gone
body:
My brother is encountering a login error at that time than he went to login error guide then it said to download some file and delete the old if needed he deleted it and now here i am no account no game history back to level 1 the file he downloaded name was lol.properties 
all of the account in my computer is deleted or in level 1 
someone tried to open my brother's account and its in level 30 but in this computer its level 1 pls help me anyone

replies.body: I'm confused about what you're seeing, for example I'm not familiar with a notification to download any files.  Your account information is saved on our server, so anything deleted locally would not affect your account at all.  I recommend using the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to run a clean reinstall for a fresh slate.  Make sure your brother is also logged into the correct region on the patch, located on the top right.  Let me know if you have any questions!
